content.raw: I might be wrong but I believe there's nothing to prevent the publication of the Ignition messages at a higher frequency than the `rate` requested. The rate seems to be effective only when there are timeouts, so when nothing is actually happening.
content.html: I might be wrong but I believe there's nothing to prevent the publication of the Ignition messages at a higher frequency than the rate requested. The rate seems to be effective only when there are timeouts, so when nothing is actually happening.
